_header: As Jesu went upon a day
_description: Gospel for Wednesday after Fourth Sunday in Lent, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Als ihesu crist went opon a dayAnd his desciples by þe way…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And euir whils him life was lentHe trowed in crist with gude entent
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Preteriens ihesu crist uidit hominem cecum.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia iiii post dominicam iiii quadragesime Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 58ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.118-126.
